li.label: unsettling presence
li.description: There's something deeply wrong about that flesh symbiont. It makes my skin crawl.

li.label: overwhelming dread
li.description: Multiple flesh symbionts nearby fill me with existential terror. The whispers are getting louder.

li.label: cosmic horror
li.description: Surrounded by alien flesh symbionts, I can feel my sanity slipping away. The boundary between nightmare and reality dissolves.

li.label: symbiotic enhancement
li.description: The flesh symbiont has made me stronger, faster... but I can feel it feeding on me. The whispers never stop.

li.label: fed the symbiont
li.description: I gave part of myself to nourish the symbiont. It felt... right, somehow. The whispers are quieter now.

li.label: attended symbiont communion
li.description: The communion ritual strengthened my connection to the flesh symbiont. I feel its power flowing through me.

li.label: symbiont was harvested
li.description: They extracted genetic material from our sacred symbiont. This feels like a violation of something pure and transcendent.

li.label: blessed symbiont presence
li.description: The flesh symbiont's presence fills me with purpose. It offers transcendence beyond mere humanity.

li.label: abhorrent symbiont
li.description: That grotesque flesh symbiont is an affront to everything pure and human. Its very existence sickens me.

li.label: corrupted colonist nearby
li.description: Seeing that bonded colonist reminds me that the symbiont's corruption spreads. They're no longer truly human.

li.label: abominable symbiont presence
li.description: As royalty, I find this grotesque symbiont to be an affront to noble sensibilities. Such alien corruption has no place in civilized society.

li.label: bonded peasant nearby
li.description: That bonded colonist has allowed themselves to be corrupted by alien flesh. Such lack of dignity is unbefitting of anyone in my presence.

li.label: symbiont meditation
li.description: The symbiont's whispers guided my meditation. I feel more connected to its alien consciousness.

li.label: feeding euphoria
li.description: The raw flesh tasted... different. Better. The symbiont approves of my choice.

li.label: witnessed transcendence
li.description: I saw what we could become. The symbiont offers evolution beyond human limitations.

li.label: witnessed alien ritual
li.description: That communion ritual was deeply disturbing. I can't shake the image of those glowing eyes and inhuman movements.
